transcript: Okay, you know what? I just don't feel like dealing with this anymore. You can have all the money back $200 right now.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Okay.  You know what?  I just don't feel like doing this anymore.  Um, you can have all the money back, two hundred dollar, right now.
